original_text: The family heads of the Levites in the days of Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan and Jaddua, as well as those of the priests, were recorded in the reign of Darius the Persian.
korean_text: 엘리아십과 요야다와 요하난과 얏두아 때에 레위 사람의 족장이 모두 책에 기록되었고 바사 왕 다리오 때에 제사장도 책에 기록되었고

sentences.original_text: The family heads of the Levites
in the days of Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan and Jaddua
as well as those of the priests
in the reign of Darius the Persian
